name: Natural Gentoo
tagline: Grub and Splashutils boot screen theme
body:
## Description

Grub and Splashutils boot screen theme with original size of Gentoo logo.


## Installation

ebuild: http://bugs.gentoo.org/show_bug.cgi?id=224127

## Screesnhots

![Verbose mode](https://github.com/jtyr/natural-gentoo/raw/gh-pages/images/gentoo-1024x768-verbose.png)

![Grub background](https://github.com/jtyr/natural-gentoo/raw/gh-pages/images/gentoo_grub.png)
